name: Binary Princess
description:
Bomber action with a cute binary princess:

You have only binary actions:

  • Move left or right - with Keyboard, left/right mouse button or gamepad
  • Lay bomb - Keyboard (Space), Middle mouse button, gamepad "A"

Try to kill as many monsters as possible.

Make sure no monster touches you.

Make sure you don't bomb yourself.

Contribution to Trijam 101

Theme: "Binary"

Assets used: 

  • CanariPack 1BIT TopDown - https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-1bit-topdown/download/_QMzzdu6JyHC1rwZJ7D...
  • Kenney Game Assets 2 -  https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-2/download/4__19H8wPW_2RhIdK9mQXJEzECQ...
  • Added some own sprite animation (explosion, bomb) using Aseprite
